name: Mr. Rock’s Roundabout Adventure
description:
Mr. Rock’s Roundabout Adventure

Creators:

Matthew Umana (Itch Page): Scripter, Level Designer

Tony Nguyen: Scripter, UI Designer

Mary Gerik: Artist, Sound/UI Designer

UT AET334K - Game Prototyping

Topic: Time Travel

Overview:

Mr. Rock’s Roundabout Adventure is a 2D side scroller where you are able to age your surroundings in order to progress through the level. Take the role as a rock creature, and make your way around the world and waiting through time. Watch the environment around you age, and manipulate time to traverse obstacles that may block your path. Wait for trees to grow, water to freeze, and ice to melt!

Goal:

Solve several environmental puzzles to get to the end of the level.

Obstacles: physical obstacles (ice, water, trees), environmental puzzles, time management

Mechanics: Press "t" to accelerate time. Left and right arrows to move back and forth.
